document_data.name: Jestra
document_data.mainbody: '''Jestra''' was a [[human]] woman of [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]] and an independent [[wizard]] specializing in the [[transmutation]] school of magic.
document_data.History: Around [[1369 DR]], she resided in Arabel, Cormyr, owned properties in Arabel and utilized her magic to increase the attractiveness of her clients as well as to improve various objects brought to her by enhancing the object's appearance and usefulness.
